name: Chard Cauliflower Carrot Wraps
description: These Mint chutney Chard Cauliflower wraps are easy to put together and burst of flavor from the mint and thyme chutney.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups packed chopped rainbow Chard  (or any greens of choice)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add a teaspoon of oil. Heat on medium-low.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, add a teaspoon of oil. Heat on medium-low.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 2 cups of packed chopped rainbow Chard or any greens of choice.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 2 cups of packed chopped rainbow Chard or any greens of choice.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and cook for 4-5 minutes. Stir and cook until wilted to preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and cook for 4-5 minutes. Stir and cook until wilted to preference.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1 cup grated cauliflower, 1/2 cup grated carrot, 2 Tablespoons chopped cilantro, 2 Tablespoons grated ginger.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1 cup grated cauliflower, 1/2 cup grated carrot, 2 Tablespoons chopped cilantro, 2 Tablespoons grated ginger.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1/2 teaspoon carom seeds(ajwain), 1/2 teaspoon cumin powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon chili flakes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1/2 teaspoon carom seeds(ajwain), 1/2 teaspoon cumin powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon chili flakes.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix and let warm up for a minute or cook covered for 4-5 minutes if you like the veggies a bit cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix and let warm up for a minute or cook covered for 4-5 minutes if you like the veggies a bit cooked.

recipeInstructions.text: Warm up a large Wheat Lavash bread (9 by 12 inch) on a pan or oven or any wrap flat bread of choice.
recipeInstructions.name: Warm up a large Wheat Lavash bread (9 by 12 inch) on a pan or oven or any wrap flat bread of choice.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the Mint Thyme Chutney on the wrap bread.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread the Mint Thyme Chutney on the wrap bread.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with the Chard Cauli carrot mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Top with the Chard Cauli carrot mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Roll up, cut and serve immediately!
recipeInstructions.name: Roll up, cut and serve immediately!

recipeInstructions.text: To store, pack in foil and warm up in the oven before serving. Serve with a side of additional chutney. Cut up into smaller tighter rolls to serve as appetizers.
recipeInstructions.name: To store, pack in foil and warm up in the oven before serving. Serve with a side of additional chutney. Cut up into smaller tighter rolls to serve as appetizers.

keywords: easy recipe, quick recipe, vegan wrap
